attributes.action: enforce legislation to make all motorcyclists to wear flourescent jackets on public roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Further to the recent "Look and Look again" campaign for greater safety for motorcyclists, they should do something to help themselves. Wearing black like its their religiion makes it harder for normal motorists to see them weaving in and out on all roads and trying to squeeze through ridiculously tight spaces. If they insist on breaking the speed limits all the time, they should be visible
